data.name: FOUNTAINS Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Fountain of Youth was hidden away. Nonetheless, it is fated that the malevolent Usurper shall slay the Ageless and unearth it once more.

FOUNTAINS is an action-RPG about fighting your way through a maze-like interconnected world. You'll take the role of a hooded stranger, recently imprisoned by a tyrannical regime. Will you escape and uncover the mysteries of this war-torn empire?

This free demo contains the entirety of the game's starting area, the first two bosses, and a lot of secrets!

  • Master tight, high-skilled combat and defeat punishing bosses against all odds
  • Find new abilities and tools to help you to defend yourself and to traverse the world
  • Meet many strange characters, both hostile and friendly
  • Secrets are everywhere, so always keep an eye out!

data.short_description: Master high-skilled combat to uncover the secrets of an ancient, interconnected world. This free demo of FOUNTAINS contains the entirety of the game's starting area, the first two bosses, and a lot of secrets!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz, dual-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: 1.2 ghz, dual-core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
